game.name: Backpack Jianghu
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Backpack jianghu is a Wuxia theme, inventory management and battle royale game. Choose a starting sect, enter the world with dozens of other players, pick your path, battle and grow, and compete in the final showdown at Mount Hua's peak.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Backpack jianghu is a Wuxia theme, inventory management and battle royale game. Choose a starting sect, enter the world with dozens of other players, pick your path, battle and grow, and compete in the final showdown at Mount Hua's peak.
